text: @SaraCarterDC I can’t tell you how many liberal “friends” when Covid-19 struck told me he was the expert they’d blindly listen to. What a joke! He has changed his tune more than a seasoned politician. I’m so glad he is not submitting my forecast, I’d long be fired.
